scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/audio-line.js -c -m -o build/audio-line.min.js && rm -f build/audio-line.zip && zip -j build/audio-line.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/audio-line.js build/audio-line.min.js
